propertyGroup.name: StartAPParamsStruct
propertyGroup.description: Structure definition for starting an AP (v1.0.10).

uint32.name: BeaconPeriod
uint32.description: If non-zero, this parameter specifies the beacon interval

uint32.name: DTIMPeriod
uint32.description: If non-zero, this parameter specifies the number of beacon intervals between transmissions of beacon frames that contain a TIM element with a DTIM Count field that equals zero. This value is transmitted in the DTIM Period field of beacon frames.

bool.name: ExcludeUnencrypted
bool.description: Specifies exclude unencrypted bit.

bool.name: DataRateSupport802_11b
bool.description: Whether the device supports 802.11b speeds or not. When this is set the AP should allow clients using 11b rates to connect to it.

bool.name: AcceptNonP2PClients
bool.description: Whether to allow legacy SoftAP clients to connect.

bool.name: MustUseSpecifiedChannels
bool.description: Whether the AP can only be started on the specified channels.

propertyGroup.name: StartAPParamsStructV1_0_1
propertyGroup.description: Structure definition for starting an AP.

uint32.name: BeaconPeriod
uint32.description: If non-zero, this parameter specifies the beacon interval

uint32.name: DTIMPeriod
uint32.description: If non-zero, this parameter specifies the number of beacon intervals between transmissions of beacon frames that contain a TIM element with a DTIM Count field that equals zero. This value is transmitted in the DTIM Period field of beacon frames.

bool.name: ExcludeUnencrypted
bool.description: Specifies exclude unencrypted bit.

bool.name: DataRateSupport802_11b
bool.description: Whether the device supports 802.11b speeds or not. When this is set the AP should allow clients using 11b rates to connect to it.

propertyGroup.name: DeletePortParametersStruct
propertyGroup.description: Structure definition for delete port parameters.

uint16.name: PortNumber
uint16.description: A 16-bit identifier of the port to delete

propertyGroup.name: CreatePortParametersStruct
propertyGroup.description: Structure definition for create port parameters.

uint16.name: OpModeMask
uint16.description: A bitwise OR value of the operation modes the host may configure on the port being created.

uint32.name: NdisPortNumber
uint32.description: The port number that will be registered with NDIS for this port.

propertyGroup.name: Dot11ResetParametersStruct
propertyGroup.description: Structure definition for dot11 reset parameters.

uint8.name: SetDefaultMIB
uint8.description: If (and only if) true, all MIB attributes for the port being reset are set to their default values.

propertyGroup.name: DefaultKeyIdParametersStruct
propertyGroup.description: Structure definition for setting default key ID for packet transmission.

uint32.name: KeyID
uint32.description: The default Key ID

propertyGroup.name: pmknamestruct
propertyGroup.description: Structure definition for WDI_TYPE_PMK_NAME.

propertyGroup.description: Structure definition for privacy exemption list parameters.

uint16.name: EtherType
uint16.description: Specifies the IEEE EtherType in big-endian byte order

namedType.name: ExemptionActionType
namedType.description: Specifies the type of exemption from the specified EtherType

namedType.name: ExemptionPacketType
namedType.description: Specifies the type of packet that the exemption for the specified EtherType applies to

propertyGroup.name: LinkStateChangeParametersStruct
propertyGroup.description: Structure definition for link state change parameters.

uint32.name: TxLinkSpeed
uint32.description: Current Tx Link Speed

uint32.name: RxLinkSpeed
uint32.description: Current Rx Link Speed

uint8.name: LinkQuality
uint8.description: Current Link Quality

propertyGroup.description: Structure definition for a Wi-Fi Direct Channel.

uint8.name: CountryOrRegionString
uint8.description: The country or region code where OperatingClass and ChannelNumber are valid.

uint8.name: OperatingClass
uint8.description: The frequency band for ChannelNumber.

namedType.name: ChannelNumber
namedType.description: The channel number for the P2P Device or Group.

propertyGroup.name: WFDDeviceType
propertyGroup.description: Structure definition for a Wi-Fi Direct device type.

uint8.name: OUI
uint8.description: OUI assigned to this device type

propertyGroup.name: P2PDeviceInfoParametersStruct
propertyGroup.description: Structure definition for P2P Device Information Parameters.

uint8.name: DeviceAddress
uint8.description: Peer's device address.

uint16.name: ConfigurationMethods
uint16.description: Configuration Methods supported by this device.

propertyGroup.name: RscStatsStruct
propertyGroup.description: Structure definition for TCP RSC statistics

uint64.name: CoalescedPkts
uint64.description: Coalesced Packets

uint64.name: CoalescedOctets
uint64.description: Coalesced Octets

uint64.name: CoalesceEvents
uint64.description: Coalesce Events

propertyGroup.name: P2PDeviceCapabilityStruct
propertyGroup.description: Structure definition for P2P Device Capability.

uint8.name: DeviceCapabilityBitmap
uint8.description: P2P Device capabilities as defined in Table 12 of P2P technical specification.

uint8.name: OSSetDeviceCapabilities
uint8.description: Bitmap of P2P Device capabilities that are set by OS.

uint32.name: WPSVersionsEnabled
uint32.description: Bitmask of which WPS versions are enabled.

propertyGroup.name: BssIdInfoStruct
propertyGroup.description: Structure for BSSID Info

uint8.name: APReachability
uint8.description: 1 - Not Reachable, 2 - Unknown, 3 - Reachable

uint8.name: Security
uint8.description: If 1, indicates that the AP identified by this BSSID supports the same security provisioning as used by the STA in its current association

uint8.name: KeyScope
uint8.description: The Key Scope bit, when set, indicates the AP indicated by this BSSID has the same authenticator as the AP sending the report. If this bit is 0, it indicates a distinct authenticator or the information is not available

uint8.name: SpectrumManagement
uint8.description: Spectrum Management is set to 1 if dot11SpectrumManagementRequired is true

uint8.name: QoS
uint8.description: QoS is set to 1 if dot11QosOptionImplemented is true

uint8.name: APSD
uint8.description: An AP sets the APSD subfield to 1 within the Capability Information field when dot11APSDOptionImplemented is true and sets it to 0 otherwise

uint8.name: RadioMeasurement
uint8.description: RadioMeasurement 1 if dot11RadioMeasurementActivated is true

uint8.name: DelayedBlockAck
uint8.description: DelayedBlockAck - 1 if dot11DelayedBlockAckOptionImplemented is true

uint8.name: ImmediateBlockAck
uint8.description: ImmediateBlockAck - 1 if dot11ImmediateBlockAckOptionImplemented is true

uint8.name: MobilityDomain
uint8.description: MobilityDomain - Set to 1 if the AP represented by this BSSID is including an MDE in its Beacon frames

uint8.name: HighThroughput
uint8.description: HighThroughput - Set to 1 to indicate that the AP represented by this BSSID is an HT AP including the HT Capabilities element in its Beacon

propertyGroup.name: P2PGroupOwnerCapabilityStruct
propertyGroup.description: P2P Group Owner capability information

uint8.name: GroupCapabilityBitmap
uint8.description: P2P Group capabilities as defined in Table 13 of P2P technical specification.

uint8.name: OSSetGroupCapabilities
uint8.description: Bitmap of P2P Group capabilities that are set by OS.

uint32.name: MaximumGroupLimit
uint32.description: Maximum client count for this group owner.

propertyGroup.name: P2PDiscoverModeStruct
propertyGroup.description: Structure definition for P2P Discover Mode Parameters

namedType.name: DiscoveryType
namedType.description: Type of discovery to be performed by the port.

bool.name: ForcedDiscovery
bool.description: A flag indicating that a complete device discovery is required. If this flag is not set, a partial discovery may be performed.

namedType.name: ScanType
namedType.description: Type of scan to be performed by port in scan phase.

namedType.name: ServiceDiscoveryType
namedType.description: Type of Service discovery to be performed by the port.

bool.name: ScanRepeatCount
bool.description: How many times the full scan procedure should be repeated. If set to 0, scan should be repeated until the task is aborted by the host.

uint32.name: TimeBetweenScans
uint32.description: If Scan Repeat Count != 1, this time specifies how long (in milliseconds) firmware should wait before repeating the scan procedure, after completing a full scan.

propertyGroup.name: P2PBackgroundDiscoverModeStruct
propertyGroup.description: Structure definition for P2P Background Discover Mode Parameters

namedType.name: DiscoveryType
namedType.description: Type of discovery to be performed by the port.

namedType.name: ServiceDiscoveryType
namedType.description: Type of Service discovery to be performed by the port.

uint32.name: DeviceVisiblilityTimeout
uint32.description: Maximum timeout for reporting a device entry in ms.

propertyGroup.name: ScanDwellTimeStruct
propertyGroup.description: Structure definition for scan dwell times.

uint32.name: ActiveChannelDwellTime
uint32.description: Time in milliseconds to dwell on active channels.

uint32.name: PassiveChannelDwellTime
uint32.description: Time in milliseconds to dwell on passive channels.

uint32.name: MaximumScanTime
uint32.description: Time in milliseconds for total scan.

propertyGroup.name: P2PListenDurationStruct
propertyGroup.description: Structure definition for P2P Listen Duration.

uint32.name: CycleDuration
uint32.description: Total Cycle duration in milliseconds.

uint32.name: ListenActiveDuration
uint32.description: Time in milliseconds during each cycle that Adapter will be listening.

propertyGroup.name: CancelParamsStruct
propertyGroup.description: Structure definition for cancel parameters.

namedType.name: OriginalTaskOID
namedType.description: OID from the original task being aborted

uint32.name: OriginalTransactionId
uint32.description: Transaction ID from the original task

namedType.name: OriginalPortId
namedType.description: Port ID from the original task

propertyGroup.description: Structure definition for scan mode parameters.

bool.name: ScanRepeatCount
bool.description: The number of times the full scan procedure should be repeated. If set to 0, scan should be repeated until the task is aborted by the host.

namedType.name: AllowedScanType

propertyGroup.name: SignalInfoStruct
propertyGroup.description: Structure definition for signal information.

int32.name: RSSI
int32.description: The received signal strength indicator (RSSI) value of the beacon or probe response from the peer. This is in units of decibels referenced to 1.0 milliwatts (dBm).

uint32.name: LinkQuality
uint32.description: The link quality value ranging from 0 through 100. A value of 100 specifies the highest link quality.

bool.description: Specifies whether this is cached information.

propertyGroup.name: P2PSendActionFrameRequestParamsStruct
propertyGroup.description: Structure definition for Action Frame Request Send Parameters.

namedType.name: RequestFrameType
namedType.description: Type of Request Frame to be sent.

namedType.name: PeerDeviceAddress
namedType.description: Device address of target peer P2P device.

uint8.name: DialogToken
uint8.description: Wi-Fi Direct Dialog Token for this transaction.

uint32.name: SendTimeout
uint32.description: Maximum time, in milliseconds to send this action frame.

uint32.name: PostACKDwellTime
uint32.description: Time to remain on listen channel, in milliseconds after the incoming packet is acknowledged.

propertyGroup.name: PeerMACStatisticsStruct
propertyGroup.description: Structure definition for MAC layer stats.

namedType.name: MACAddress
namedType.description: MAC address of the peer that these counts are set for. For multicast and broadcast packets, this value is set of FF-FF-FF-FF-FF-FF-FF

uint64.name: TransmittedFrameCount
uint64.description: The number of MSDU packets and MMPDU frames that the IEEE MAC layer of the 802.11 station successfully transmitted.

uint64.name: ReceivedFrameCount
uint64.description: The number of MSDU packets and MMPDU frames that the IEEE MAC layer of the 802.11 station successfully received.

uint64.name: WEPExcludedCount
uint64.description: The number of unencrypted received MPDU frames that the MAC layer discarded when the IEEE 802.11 dot11ExcludeUnencrypted management information base (MIB) object is enabled.

uint64.name: TKIPLocalMICFailures
uint64.description: The number of received MSDU packets that the 802.11 station discarded because of MIC failures.

uint64.name: TKIPReplays
uint64.description: The number of received MPDU frames that the 802.11 station discarded because of the TKIP replay protection procedure.

uint64.name: TKIPICVErrorCount
uint64.description: The number of encrypted MPDU frames that the 802.11 station failed to decrypt because of a TKIP ICV error.

uint64.name: CCMPFormatErrors
uint64.description: The number of received MPDU frames that the 802.11 discarded because of an invalid AES-CCMP format.

uint64.name: CCMPReplays
uint64.description: The number of received MPDU frames that the 802.11 station discarded because of the AES-CCMP replay protection procedure.

uint64.name: CCMPDecryptErrors
uint64.description: The number of received MPDU frames that the 802.11 station discarded because of errors detected by the AES-CCMP decryption algorithm.

uint64.name: WEPUndecryptableCount
uint64.description: The number of encrypted MPDU frames received for which a WEP decryption key was not available on the 802.11 station.

uint64.name: WEPICVErrorCount
uint64.description: The number of encrypted MPDU frames that the 802.11 station failed to decrypt because of a WEP ICV error.

uint64.name: DecryptSuccessCount
uint64.description: The number of received encrypted packets that the 802.11 station successfully decrypted.

uint64.name: DecryptFailureCount
uint64.description: The number of encrypted packets that the 802.11 station failed to decrypt.

propertyGroup.name: PHYStatisticsStruct
propertyGroup.description: Structure definition for PHY layer stats.

uint64.name: TransmittedFrameCount
uint64.description: The number of MSDU packets and MMPDU frames that the IEEE PHY layer of the 802.11 station has successfully transmitted.

uint64.name: GroupTransmittedFrameCount
uint64.description: The number of multicast or broadcast MSDU packets and MMPDU frames that the IEEE PHY layer of the 802.11 station has successfully transmitted.

uint64.name: FailedCount
uint64.description: The number of MSDU packets and MMPDU frames that the 802.11 station failed to transmit after exceeding the retry limits defined by the 802.11 IEEE dot11ShortRetryLimit or dot11LongRetryLimit MIB counters

uint64.name: RetryCount
uint64.description: The number of MSDU packets and MMPDU frames that the 802.11 station successfully transmitted after one or more attempts.

uint64.name: MultipleRetryCount
uint64.description: The number of MSDU packets and MMPDU frames that the 802.11 station successfully transmitted after more than one retransmission attempt.

uint64.name: MaxTXLifetimeExceededCount
uint64.description: The number of MSDU packets and MMPDU frames that the 802.11 station failed to transmit because of a timeout as defined by the IEEE 802.11 dot11MaxTransmitMSDULifetime MIB object

uint64.name: TransmittedFragmentCount
uint64.description: The number of MPDU frames that the 802.11 station transmitted and acknowledged through a received 802.11 ACK frame.

uint64.name: RTSSuccessCount
uint64.description: The number of times that the 802.11 station received a Clear To Send (CTS) frame in response to a Request To Send (RTS) frame

uint64.name: RTSFailureCount
uint64.description: The number of times that the 802.11 station did not receive a CTS frame in response to an RTS frame

uint64.name: ACKFailureCount
uint64.description: The number of times that the 802.11 station expected and did not receive an Acknowledgement (ACK) frame

uint64.name: ReceivedFrameCount
uint64.description: The number of MSDU packets and MMPDU frames that the 802.11 station has successfully received.

uint64.name: GroupReceivedFrameCount
uint64.description: The number of multicast or broadcast MSDU packets and MMPDU frames that the 802.11 station has successfully received.

uint64.name: PromiscuousReceivedFrameCount
uint64.description: The number of MSDU packets or MMPDU frames received by the 802.11 station when a promiscuous packet filter is enabled.

uint64.name: MaxRXLifetimeExceededCount
uint64.description: The number if MSDU packets and MMPDU frames that the 802.11 station discarded because of a timeout as defined by the IEEE 802.11 dot11MaxReceiveLifetime MIB object

uint64.name: FrameDuplicateCount
uint64.description: The number of duplicate MPDU frames that the 802.11 station received

uint64.name: ReceivedFragmentCount
uint64.description: The number of MPDU frames received by the 802.11 station for MSDU packets or MMPDU frames.

uint64.name: PromiscuousReceivedFragmentCount
uint64.description: The number of MPDU frames received by the 802.11 station for MSDU packets or MMPDU frames when a promiscuous packet filter was enabled.

uint64.name: FCSErrorCount
uint64.description: The number of MPDU frames that the 802.11 station received with FCS errors
